answerText: large intestine [or colon][10] Unlike in Crohn's disease, the large intestine is the only organ affected by this unpleasant inflammatory bowel disease, in which open sores throughout the intestine result in constant bloody diarrhea.

question: Question:  [10] Identify this digestive organ whose final straight portion, the rectum, feeds into the anus.
